EmailTemplate.subject: Tickets now available for Ignite 2015 - our fantastic launch event for The Challenge Society!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
We are very excited to announce at the biggest event in The Challenge Society calender is just around the corner and tickets are going fast! Our Ignite event on Saturday 28th of November is a fantastic launch event for The Challenge Society and is all about YOU, YOUR next steps and YOUR future!
Check out just some of the professional partners, workshops and activities that are on offer for you to be involved with. We will be announcing all future partners AND all the information on the end of Ignite party on our Twitter page - so get online and follow us on @Challenge_SUR.
Click here to reserve your space. Limited tickets are available for our priority admission so reserve your space now!
WORKSHOPS
CV Writing and Interview Skills
Managing Your Personal Finances
Getting into the Media Industry with BBC Surrey
Workplace Skills with Young Enterprise
Learn about Apprenticeships with Guildford College
Retail and Visual Merchandising Workshop with Marks and Spencers
And many more will be announced over the next few weeks...
DROP IN SESSIONS
Get individualized feedback on your Personal Statement, CV's and Cover Letters from industry professionals.
You can also be involved in a mock interview and get some individual feedback on your interview technique!
These sessions are very popular so arrive early to avoid disappointment!
CAREER NETWORKING
Do you need advice on how to get into your dream career?!
Are you undecided and interested in learning about different industries?
Come and talk to a huge range of professionals and learn more about their industry, what they enjoy, and how you can get there!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Kay at kay.obibi@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge Society team!
